original_title: Tom and Jerry Santa's Little Helpers
overview: The world's favorite cat and mouse team, Tom and Jerry (joined by Nibbles Mouse, who is known as Tuffy again) return in this new 2-Disc collection of their most wonderful wintertime adventures. Included in this compilation is the all-new holiday special, Santa’s Little Helpers, where Jerry and Tuffy are living the good life in Santa’s workshop, until the unfortunate day on which Tom is rescued by the Clause family. With Tom in the house, merry mayhem ensues at the North Pole, but when the dust settles, the destructive duo now have to work together to save Christmas and learn the true meaning of friendship.
title: Tom and Jerry Santa's Little Helpers

titles.title: Tom et Jerry - Droles de lutins pour le père Noel
Tom et Jerry - Drôles de lutins pour le père Noël
